General.Name: Benjamin Hill Mining Corp
General.Description: Benjamin Hill Mining Corp. engages in the exploration and development of natural resource properties in Mexico. The company explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. It has an option to acquire a 100% interest in Sonora Gold property located in the mining district of Benjamin Hill in Sonora, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Mojave Gold Corp. and changed its name to Benjamin Hill Mining Corp. in April 2021. Benjamin Hill Mining Corp. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Richmond, Canada.
General.Address: 1050-12471 Horseshoe Way, Richmond, BC, Canada, V7A 4X6

1.Name: Mr. Gregory R. Bronson B.Sc., P.Geo.
